snippet.title: Swift 3: Firebase Social Login - Facebook Email and Custom Login Button (Ep 2)
snippet.description:
Today, we'll continue our series with a video on how to get the email address of our Facebook user after they are authenticated.  

Next, I'll show you guys how to implement your own custom Facebook login button.  

Finally, let's take our Facebook application live by visiting the console in the Facebook app dashboard.

Step-by-step Tutorial and Completed Project Download:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/playlist/Firebase-Social-Login/video/Facebook-Email-and-Custom-Login-Button

Previous Episode:
https://youtu.be/iSszeW1aH6I

Feel free to drop me a line on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
